title: 92/283/EEC: Commission Decision of 8 May 1992 approving the plan for the approval of establishments for the purposes of intra-Community trade in poultry and hatching eggs submitted by the Netherlands (Only the Dutch text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 8 May 1992  approving the plan for the approval of establishments for the purposes of intra-Community trade in poultry and hatching eggs submitted by the Netherlands  (Only the Dutch text is authentic)  (92/283/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The plan submitted by the Netherlands for the approval of establishments for the purposes of intra-Community trade in poultry and hatching eggs is hereby approved.
The Netherlands shall bring into force by 1 May 1992 the laws, regulations and administrative provisions for implementation of the plan referred to in Article 1.
This Decision is addressed to the Netherlands.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 May 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 303, 31. 10. 1990, p. 6. (2) OJ No L 268, 24. 9. 1991, p. 56.
